content.rendered:
There are several reasons why someone could opt to attend graduate school. For some, it’s a drive to facilitate improvements and changes in an area they care greatly about, or a passion for learning. Graduate school can be a place and time for you to invent, explore, and examine in a world of amazing and constant change. It’s an opportunity to work across boundaries with teachers and colleagues, to study at a deeper level, and to contribute to the development of new information that can change the way we think about the world.

Others view graduate school as the next stage in their career. Whether you want to transfer into a new area or advance your career, a graduate degree will provide you with extra skills, subject matter expertise, and competences, making you more competitive professionally.

Whatever your reason for thinking about graduate school, BSU-OU offers a program for you. With our programs, you’ll be part of a community of over 300 graduate students who will assist you in doing your best work and provide opportunities to explore your curiosity and enhance your career.
